com.apercova.quickcsv

Class CsvWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apercova.quickcsv.CsvWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class CsvWriter
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Writer for Comma-Separated values in compliance with RFC 4180 plus custom delimiter and quoted values. 
      Common Format and MIME Type for Comma-Separated Values (CSV) Files
  https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4180
    Version:
    1.0 2017.08
    Author:
    @apercova https://github.com/apercova

        Throws:
        CsvWriterException - If an error happens whilst writing.

      • write

        public static void write(Writer writer,
                         List<List<String>> values)
                  throws CsvWriterException
        Core implementation for writing csv-values from a list of values.
        Parameters:
        writer - Destination for writing.
        values - List of csv values.
        Throws:
        CsvWriterException - If an error happens whilst writing.

      • write

        public static void write(Writer writer,
                         List<List<String>> values,
                         boolean autoflush)
                  throws CsvWriterException
        Core implementation for writing csv-values from a list of values.
        Parameters:
        writer - Destination for writing.
        values - List of csv values.
        autoflush - Defines if destination writer should be flushed.
        Throws:
        CsvWriterException - If an error happens whilst writing.

      • write

        public static void write(Writer writer,
                         List<List<String>> values,
                         char delimiter,
                         char quote)
                  throws CsvWriterException
        Core implementation for writing csv-values from a list of values.
        Parameters:
        writer - Destination for writing.
        values - List of csv values.
        delimiter - Delimiter character. Default is a comma(,).
        quote - Quote character. Default is a double quote char(").
        Throws:
        CsvWriterException - If an error happens whilst writing.

      • write

        public static void write(Writer writer,
                         List<List<String>> values,
                         char delimiter,
                         char quote,
                         boolean autoflush)
                  throws CsvWriterException
        Core implementation for writing csv-values from a list of values.
        Parameters:
        writer - Destination for writing.
        values - List of csv values.
        delimiter - Delimiter character. Default is a comma(,).
        quote - Quote character. Default is a double quote char(").
        autoflush - Defines if destination writer should be flushed.
        Throws:
        CsvWriterException - If an error happens whilst writing.

      • formatValue

        public static String formatValue(String value,
                                 char delimiter,
                                 char quote)
        Format a text value as in RFC 4180.
        Parameters:
        value - Text value.
        delimiter - Delimiter character. Default is a comma(,).
        quote - Quote character. Default is a double quote char(").
        Returns:
        Csv formated text value.
